paper_abstract: Collocation analysis finds semantic associations of concepts using large text corpora. If the same procedure is applied to sets of outgoing links of web pages, we can find semantically related web domains to a large extent. The structure of the semantic clusters shows all proper-ties of small worlds. The algorithm is known to work for large parts of the web like the German internet. As a sample application we present a surf guide for the German web.
paper_title: Calculating communities by link analysis of URLs
